Articles.Content:
What do you need to do?

A Kerbal Kouple just got married. They got kind of stressed from all that wedding planning and want to have a honeymoon. They are a kabillionaire couple and they want the unforgetable journey they will never forget. You need to send the just married couple on a comfortable trip that does not take alot of stress to handle. This means that the couple do not want to sit in a crammed capsule for 3 years. You also need to keep the price low. The couple need to pay 10% of the funds required to build the thing. So keep an eye on that. Dont forget to get them back too!

Where do they need to go?

It does not really matter, but at least let them enjoy their flight in the best way possible. But every planet/moon has a different point value:

Just space: 5p (Zero G! Yay!)

The mun: 20p (Just rocks)

Minmus: 50p (They really like scooping mint flavour ice cream from there!)

Duna: 60p (We could,ve gone to the Sakara Desert instead)

Ike: 30p (Its just like the Mun lol)

Dres: 30p (Its just like Ike lol)

Laythe: 100p (I can take a deep breath and look at the beatifull green basketba

Vall: 70p (The ice cream is much harder here, but the green ball in the sky just cheers everything up)

Tylo: 65p (Its just like Kerbin, but without the nice feeling of fresh air, but i can see all the moons from here!)

Bop: 75p (That kraken thing looks scary, but it is a very special memorial.)

Pol: 75p (The landscape here is amazing!)

Eeloo: 75p (Ice skating is very charming here. But sadly we cant dig through the thick ice layer that covers an ocean with life)

Eve: 150p (Purple and pink! The colours of love! No, red is a bloody color, dont even think about it)

Gilly: 60p (The almost zero G effect is nice here lol)

Moho: 75p (Getting that interplanetary tanned skin makes everybody jealous)

Space Station: 80p (This means that a year in space is only -4p! Efficient!)

How long does it need to take?

Every year costs you -43 points! And every day costs you -0,1 points!

How much crew space?

You need to hold the couple on the rocket (Duh). And maybe a pilot. Not more crew. Every extra crew capacity is 5p!

Can i do this in career?

Yes of course! If you do this in career mode you will get 10% more points!

How do i submit my mission?

Just show the crew capacity, mission time and all the other important stuff. And some pictures of the spacecraft and crew. You also could make a video, wich is probably is a better idea!

How can i win this challenge? And what if i do?

The first one who gets over 400p wins at first. And if you win, you wont get anything special this challenge is made for pure fun, not fortune. But you could maybe get a shoutout. And if the winner is chosen, the game is over. Even though you can continue with the challenge.

Have fun y'all!

 

(Btw im not a homophobe, gay marriage is legal on Kerbin!)
Does you need to get into orbit to be in space (i am not stupid it is just about the points) or can you do like a new shepard thing
Uh missions to Jool take at least three years. Do you mean you want a habitation module for them to live in rather than a small cockpit?

On 4-7-2016 at 8:21 PM, Firemetal said:

Uh missions to Jool take at least three years. Do you mean you want a habitation module for them to live in rather than a small cockpit?

Yes. Just a bigger module where they can move around.

@rkarmarkNo, at least in space for more than 1 minute.

Edited July 8, 2016 by NSEP
